document_data.name: Great Hospital
document_data.mainbody: The '''Great Hospital''' was a center for healing located in the city of [[Dhaztanar]] in [[Semphar]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The Great Hospital was located within the [[Furdah Rustauk District]] in southwest Dhaztanar. It was found along the shores of [[Gbor Nor]] near the royal stables in sight of the [[Madinat]].
